weekly_top_story.headline: White House Releases Sweeping AI Action Plan Prioritizing Healthcare
weekly_top_story.summary: The White House unveiled a comprehensive AI action plan focusing on over 90 policy measures designed to foster responsible AI use in healthcare, aiming to improve outcomes, interoperability, and consumer protections.

stories.headline: Health and Human Services Commission Proposes Nursing Facility Rate Increases Effective September 1, 2025
stories.summary: Effective September 1, 2025, HHSC will implement increased nursing facility rates while discontinuing direct care staff rate enhancements, impacting funding and operational structures in long-term care.
